#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
void point(long long int count[],long long int n,long long int m)
{
        long long int i;

        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(count[i]==(n-i)) {cout<<"2"<<" "<<i<<"\n"; return;}
        }
        cout<<"1"<<"\n";
}
main()
{

    long long int tc,n,m,x,y,i;

    cin>>tc;
    while(tc--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        long long int count[n+1];
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++) count[i]=0;

        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            cin>>x>>y;
            count[min(x,y)]++;
            count[max(x,y)]--;
        }
        point(count,n,m);
    }
}
